title: Chat Website
description: Website allows you and your friend create rooms and invite people to join room, using Firebase, React to build

title: Facebook Clone
description: Website allows you post new feed, add friends and chat with your friends without show messages to others, using Firebase, Reactjs to build

title: Food Order Website
description: User can order food in website, and manage their payment online, can create, update and delete restaurant, food in your restaurant as seller
